A '''block sound type''' is a set of sounds that blocks use when they are broken, placed, hit, fallen on, stepped on, jumped from,{{Only|BE}} or landed on.{{Only|BE}}

If a player is stepping on [[carpet]], [[Crimson Roots|crimson]] or [[warped roots]], [[moss carpet]], [[Nether sprouts]], or [[snow]] (blocks in the {{code|combination_step_sound_blocks}} [[block tag]]) then the step sound of the block underneath plays at {{fraction|1|3}} of the volume and {{fraction|4|5}} of the pitch.{{Only|JE}}

[[Horses]] and variations of horses use the volumes and pitches of blocks they are standing on to determine how certain sounds are made.
